QuestionJSON.Answer1: Application software relies on the system software to manage interactions with the hardware.
QuestionJSON.Answer2: System software directly interacts with the hardware to carry out tasks.
QuestionJSON.Answer3: Hardware can perform tasks without any input from the system or application software.
QuestionJSON.Answer4: Application software uses system software's functionalities provided as interfaces to interact with the hardware.
QuestionJSON.Explanation: Hardware cannot perform tasks by itself without being directed by system software, which acts as an intermediary between the hardware and the application software. Incorrect assumptions can lead to programming errors when developing software.
